enb_long_title: Thirty-seventh session of the Intergovernmental Panel on Climate Change (IPCC-37)
sentences: At its meeting, held from 23-26 September 2013 in Stockholm, Sweden, WGI finalized its AR5 contribution titled 'Climate Change 2013: The Physical Science Basis'.
The Panel then met to approve the WGI SPM and accepted the underlying report, including the Technical Summary and annexes.
